metadata.description: This NFT is a collaboration between ASUKA KIRARA and TTX. Especially this is her First NFT on a public chain. \nASUKA KIRARA and TTX have an exclusive agreement for the production of NFTs, which makes this the only official ASUKA KIRARA NFT on the Ethereum chain. We hope you enjoy this piece of art that captures her 'now.'
metadata.name: Asuka_Kirara_LimitedNFT
